data.name: Hasura Con
data.description: The first Hasura user conference is happening online from 3-10 June! Join us for workshops & talks by our users, community & engineers as we explore pushing the boundaries of GraphQL with Hasura.

relatedRecords.name: Global AI Fest Virtual Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Conference
relatedRecords.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Global 2020 Summer AI/ML Fest ”, a 1-day virtual event on Friday, July 31, 10:00AM to 3:30PM EST online. The URLs for the session tracks will be sent to RSVPs on July 30th.
Event Schedule - TBA
